title: [Large-Scale] Mathematical Modeling and Decision-Making Education for Strengthening Disaster Preparedness Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and statistical knowledge, understanding of fundamental disaster management concepts
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers. Domain Expertise: Intermediate. Delivery Mode: Online Real-Time. Assessment Method: Project-Based. Tech Environment: BYOD

learning_goals: Learners can convert disaster scenarios into mathematical models to propose resource allocation optimization strategies
Learners can predict disaster damage scales and develop response strategies using statistical analysis
Learners can design community disaster response systems using simulation tools and prepare evaluation reports
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
